member.name: T:NETMetaCoder.MSBuild.RewriteProjectSyntax
member.summary: An MSBuild task that scans a project that depends on this library and rewrites the syntax where necessary.

member.name: P:NETMetaCoder.MSBuild.RewriteProjectSyntax.TargetsFileDirectory
member.summary: The directory containing the targets file, from which this has been called.

member.name: P:NETMetaCoder.MSBuild.RewriteProjectSyntax.ProjectRootDirectory
member.summary: The path to the root directory of the project that this library is a dependency of.

member.name: P:NETMetaCoder.MSBuild.RewriteProjectSyntax.OutputDirectoryName
member.summary: The path to the directory where the rewritten syntax will be stored.

member.name: P:NETMetaCoder.MSBuild.RewriteProjectSyntax.CompilationUnits
member.summary: An array of paths to the code files that are to be compiled, before this library processes any files.
member.remarks: This library works by redirecting MSBuild to compile processed files, instead of the original files in the codebase.

member.name: P:NETMetaCoder.MSBuild.RewriteProjectSyntax.LogLevel
member.summary: The logging level to apply when executing this MSBuild task.
member.remarks: It corresponds to values from the NETMetaCoder.LogLevelZ enumeration.

member.name: P:NETMetaCoder.MSBuild.RewriteProjectSyntax.NewCompilationUnits
member.summary: An array of paths to the code files that are to be compiled, after this library has processed a project's files.
member.remarks: This library works by redirecting MSBuild to compile processed files, instead of the original files in the codebase.
